definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探討應用模糊數學方法評價論文稿質量的可行性。

sentences.english: The paper describes operation dynamics of motor-cars with fuzzy mathematical method.
sentences.chinese: 該文利用模糊數學方法對車輛的運行動態進行描述。

sentences.english: The illegibility mathematics is used for evaluating water quality.
sentences.chinese: 將模糊數學應用於水質評價中。

sentences.english: So some fuzzy math is required.
sentences.chinese: 所以就需要引入一些模糊數學了。

sentences.english: This paper deals elementally with some views concerning the integration of philosophy into fuzzy mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要淺談模糊數學與哲學相結合的一些看法。

sentences.english: A fuzzy mathematics method about whole pass judgment of examination paper .
sentences.chinese: 試卷整體評判的模糊數學方法。

sentences.english: A kind of self -tuning PID regulator based on fuzzy mathematics theory is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 基於模糊數學理論設計了一種自校正PID調節器。

sentences.english: New textbook contents and systems are assessed with the tools of fuzzy mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 運用模糊數學的知識對新教材的內容和體系進行評估。

sentences.english: In this paper, we studied the content validity of the examination questions in physics by means of fuzzy mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 本文動用模糊數學方法研究了物理試題的內容效度。

sentences.english: Impact on price of commodity apartment of second-hand house;
sentences.chinese: 本文運用模糊數學知識來解決二手房屋的價格評估。

sentences.english: In this paper, a method based on fuzzy mathematics to fuse multimodality medical images was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於模糊數學的方法來融合多模醫學圖像。

sentences.english: Programmes of the general transport layout are evaluated by fuzzy method.
sentences.chinese: 利用模糊數學的方法對總圖運輸設計方案進行了評價。

sentences.english: Research on application of fuzzy mathematics to water quality evaluation of wetland.
sentences.chinese: 模糊數學在溼地水質評價中的應用研究。

sentences.english: Fuzzy multifactorial decision is one of the widely applied methods in fuzzy mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 模糊綜合評判是應用較爲廣泛的模糊數學方法之一。

sentences.english: Adopting fuzzy mathematics, the paper evaluated synthetically the quality of Tibetan parched flour made from different feed proportioning.
sentences.chinese: 應用模糊數學的方法綜合評價糌粑感官質量。
